description:
Reno (レノ, Reno) is a prominent member of the Turks who appears in the Compilation of Final Fantasy VII, and is always accompanied by fellow Turk, Rude. In battle, he wields an Electro-Mag Rod, a nightstick with a taser on one end. Reno also has a penchant for gossiping and is a competent helicopter pilot.
Source: http://finalfantasy.wikia.com/wiki/Reno
name: Reno
